nodes.text: The Nephrans were a sentient crustacean species that were native to the water-rich planet Nepotis. Therm Scissorpunch was a member of this species.
The Nephran were a species of olive green or orange colored skin and black eyes. The Nephrans had claws, tentacles attached to their head, and clawed feet.
The Nephran hailed from the water-rich planet Nepotis. Besides this, not much was known about them or their homeworld.
Therm Scissorpunch was a male Nephran who lived during the Imperial Era. Therm was known to frequent the card tables on the planet Vandor.
Mirack was a male Nephran who was part of a pirate crew lead by Grox.
